description: Pun on traffic stop and punctuation.
title: Stop Fail
n_1: Sentence sits in the driver's seat, nervous but ready.
n_2: Approaching a stop sign, Sentence slows down slightly.
n_3: Sentence rolls past the stop sign, eyes wide.
n_4: Instructor shakes her head as they park.
c2_4: Ever heard of a full stop?
